ok i found out how to fix it up a lot more:
find your config files in your GTA San Andreas Preferences folder
in config search for [sdldrv]
and add a line after forceVsync
"MouseWarping" = "0"

THen search for   [dinput]
add a line after defaultdeadzone
"AbsoluteMouseSensitivity" = "1"
then it should work better
